taDuoc: Glyceryl monostearat, hyprolose, hypromelose, methacrylic acid copolymer, cellulose vi tinh thể, parafin, macrogol, polysorbat 80, crospovidon, natri stearyl fumarat, triethyl citrat, lactose monohydrat, xanthan gum, PEG 6000, PEG 400, povidon k30, bột mùi chanh, acid citric, magnesi stearat
